title: Still in a game but client is letting me start a new one.
body:
Help.  Im still in a game (laning against rumble top 7 min in) when I disconnected but my internet had no issues. 

When I relogged on it was just the standard home client and it is letting me start another que  for another game instead of letting me reconnect.

op.gg says im still in game though so...

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=i+am+pacman

replies.body: Was that the game where you were playing Warwick? We noticed earlier today that he might be the cause of some games ending out of nowhere, so we now have him disabled. It looks like that game was one of the ones that hit this weird bug, but essentially that game was closed out for some reason.
Bump  same thing just happen to me and it let me start a  new game.

Same thing! Playing JG with {{champion:57}}  and then It froze attempted to reconnect waited awhile then I disconnected and its letting me start a new game which is weird? I usually get a reconnect button which I was hoping to do. Hope everything works out for u!
